title: A giraffe doing yoga? AI model transforms words into visualizations.
itunes:title: A giraffe doing yoga? AI model transforms words into visualizations.
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: Sometimes, innovative ideas can be hard to visualize when you don’t have an image in front of you. Now, there’s a machine-learning program to help. Marketplace’s Kimberly Adams explores the artificial intelligence model DALL-E 2 and the images it renders using text prompts.
itunes:summary: Sometimes, innovative ideas can be hard to visualize when you don’t have an image in front of you. Now, there’s a machine-learning program to help. Marketplace’s Kimberly Adams explores the artificial intelligence model DALL-E 2 and the images it renders using text prompts.
